item.description:
Having been one of the "Germanies" in this group, for a few months, I have greatly enjoyed the meetups, and would be happy to continue with the organization.

The group site will be a little "under construction", for the following week. Let's, however, plan for the next Meetup, on Saturday, June 23, at 7pm. The RockBottom Brewery and Restaurant should be a good choice for the first Meetup of the group's second year.

group.name: The Boston German Language Meetup Group

item.name: Monthly Meetup
